title._content: Image taken from page 65 of 'Tenting on the Plains; or, General Custer in Kansas and Texas. [With illustrations, including portraits.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Tenting on the Plains; or, General Custer in Kansas and Texas. [With illustrations, including portraits.]" Author: CUSTER, Elizabeth Bacon. Contributor: Custer, George A. (George Armstrong) Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10410.g.16." Page: 65 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1888 Publisher: Sampson Low, Marston, Searle, & Rivington Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000842824 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
